name: Sonic Judgement 2! The Mystical Realms IMPROVED DEMO
name_original: Sonic Judgement 2! The Mystical Realms IMPROVED DEMO
description:
This is the improved demo. Much better gameplay, better moves and a secret character once you finish all 3 characters!

This game is in development along with another one.

This will also get updates on  bug fixes and such.
